text: Emma Leigh Broyles (born July 25, 2001) is an American beauty pageant contestant who won Miss Alaska 2021 and Miss America 2022 on December 16, 2021. She is the first Miss Alaska to be crowned Miss America. She is also the first titleholder outside of the contiguous United States since Angela Perez Baraquio of Hawaii in 2001. ==References== Category:Living people Category:2001 births Category:Miss America winners Category:People from Anchorage, Alaska
title: Emma Broyles
